remarks: Periodic image of a point ` Y ` that's in the period that begins with the point ` X ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem26.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem26.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem26.3 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem26.4 $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem26.5 $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem26.6 $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem26.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( E ` X ) = B ) $.
fourierdlem26.8 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( X (,] ( X + T ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem26 $p |- ( ph -> ( E ` Y ) = ( A + ( Y - X ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d T x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
